title: My Book of Amazing Achievements
description: A new and exciting method of encouraging and rewarding positive behavior in pre-kindergarten through fourth grade students. My Book of Amazing Achievements allows the student to CHOOSE the achievement they wish to exhibit for the day. At the close of the day, their teacher (or parent) will sign and date if achieved. The student is rewarded by a signature of approval as well as acknowledged for their effort. Build self-esteem in your classroom (or home) with this book full of positive reinforcement!
author: April Chloe Terrazas
